DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels and policies on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.
